description.value:
Requirement: The Fighting Stance ability from the Fighter class.

Using magic to sharpen your focus and give stability to your stances, you’re able to make up for weaknesses that proficiency alone cannot solve.

When entering a Fighting Stance, you can choose to spend Mana equal to your proficiency bonus to ignore 1 of the Stance’s Cons.

In addition, learn 1 Fighting Stance when you gain this ability.

system.requirements: Must have the Wizard Starter Abilities and the Fighting Stance ability from the Fighter class.
